actions.text: Ordered to lie over under the rule.

official_title: A resolution concerning problems of African nations.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the Secretary of State of the United States shall not make any commitments involving actions by the U.S. or obligation of funds from the U.S. Treasury in connection with a solution of problems of African nations without first obtaining approval from Congress.

titles.title: A resolution concerning problems of African nations.
